title: L'Amigo
shortDesc: Advanced LeetCode friends analytics and automation tool for tracking peer progress and syncing solutions to GitHub.
longDesc:
L'Amigo is a sophisticated browser extension engineered for competitive programmers, software engineers, and technical interview candidates. The platform provides a comprehensive suite of analytics, peer-tracking metrics, and automation tools designed to optimize the LeetCode preparation workflow. By integrating directly into the LeetCode environment, L'Amigo bridges the gap between individual practice and collaborative competitive growth.

Key features include a Native UI Injection Engine that modifies the LeetCode DOM in real-time, an Advanced Squad Analytics Dashboard for visualizing problem-solving patterns, and Topic Mastery Profiling which extracts domain specialties like Dynamic Programming or Graph Theory. The extension also features an Automated GitHub Solution Repository Sync, preserving the user's solved problem library by synchronizing accepted submissions with a dedicated GitHub repository using an incremental sync algorithm.

Built with React 18 and TypeScript, L'Amigo ensures data privacy by storing all credentials locally via the Chrome Storage API. It leverages the LeetCode GraphQL API and GitHub REST API v3 to provide real-time updates and seamless integration, making it the ultimate tactical companion for serious technical preparation and squad-based competitive learning.

title: OmniFlow
shortDesc: Universal College ERP Platform designed to streamline institutional operations and enhance academic management.
longDesc:
OmniFlow is a comprehensive Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) solution tailored for modern educational institutions. It unifies complex campus operations into a single, intuitive interface, managing everything from student admissions and fee collections to academic grading and library resources. The platform replaces fragmented legacy systems with a cohesive digital ecosystem.

Designed with a focus on user experience, OmniFlow allows faculty to easily manage attendance, course materials, and assignments, while students get a dedicated portal for tracking their academic progress, viewing timetables, and accessing learning resources. Administrative tools provide real-time insights into institutional performance through advanced analytics and reporting dashboards.

The system is built for scalability and security, featuring role-based access control to ensure data privacy across different user groups including Students, Faculty, Admin, and Parents. With its responsive design, OmniFlow ensures that critical campus information is accessible anytime, anywhere, fostering better communication and operational efficiency.

title: Gramin Saathi
shortDesc: AI-powered rural financial literacy platform helping farmers access government schemes and weather data through intelligent loan processing.
longDesc:
Gramin Saathi is a revolutionary AI-powered rural financial literacy platform designed specifically for Indian farmers. Built during the Thapar Hackathon 2025, this comprehensive solution bridges the gap between rural communities and government welfare schemes by providing intelligent loan processing, real-time weather data integration, and multilingual support through i18n. The platform addresses the critical need for financial inclusion in rural India.

The platform leverages Google's Gemini AI for natural language processing, enabling farmers to interact in their native language without any technical barriers. Key features include personalized scheme recommendations based on individual farmer profiles, crop advisory services based on real-time weather patterns, integrated loan eligibility calculators, and a Progressive Web App (PWA) architecture that ensures offline access in areas with limited connectivity.

The technical architecture combines React with TypeScript for type-safe frontend development, Tailwind CSS for rapid UI development, and Firebase for backend services including authentication and real-time database. The responsive design ensures seamless usage across devices from basic feature phones to modern tablets, making it truly accessible to the rural population it serves.

title: Project Orion
shortDesc: Advanced AI agent system for automated loan processing using LangGraph and multi-agent workflows with FastAPI backend.
longDesc:
Project Orion represents the next generation of banking automation, built for the EY Techathon 2025. This sophisticated AI agent system revolutionizes the loan processing workflow by implementing multi-agent orchestration using LangGraph and LangChain. The platform features autonomous AI agents that handle document verification, credit scoring, risk assessment, and loan approval decisions with minimal human intervention, significantly reducing processing time.

The architecture combines a React TypeScript frontend with a FastAPI Python backend, leveraging Pydantic for robust data validation and type safety. The system includes real-time agent visualization, showing users the decision-making process as AI agents collaborate on their application. This transparency builds trust and helps users understand each step of their loan journey. Features include automated KYC verification, income analysis with document parsing, collateral assessment, and intelligent underwriting.

The multi-agent system is powered by Google's Gemini AI for contextual understanding and decision-making. Each agent specializes in a specific domain - Document Agent for verification, Credit Agent for scoring, Risk Agent for assessment, and Approval Agent for final decisions. The agents communicate through a sophisticated message-passing system, ensuring coordinated processing while maintaining individual accountability for each decision.

title: PEC Fest 2025
shortDesc: Official website for PEC's annual technical festival featuring SSR, event management, and real-time updates.
longDesc:
The official website for PEC Chandigarh's flagship annual technical and cultural festival, serving as the digital hub for one of North India's largest college fests. Built with Next.js for server-side rendering, the platform handles thousands of concurrent users during peak registration periods while maintaining exceptional performance and SEO optimization. The website serves as the primary touchpoint for students from colleges across the country.

The website features comprehensive event management including online registration with team formation, detailed event schedules with calendar integration, live updates during the fest, and real-time results tracking. Participants can browse through various competitions, register their teams, track submission deadlines, and view their standings. The admin panel provides organizers with powerful tools to manage events, participants, schedules, and announcements in real-time.

Integration with MongoDB and Prisma ensures efficient data management with proper schema validation and query optimization. The Tailwind CSS design system creates a visually stunning and consistent user experience across all pages. Performance optimizations include image optimization, code splitting, and caching strategies that ensure the website remains responsive even during high-traffic periods like registration deadlines and result announcements.

title: Conduit
shortDesc: Full-stack Medium clone with advanced features including bookmarking, user mentions, notifications, and real-time interactions.
longDesc:
Conduit is a comprehensive full-stack blogging platform built as a real-world implementation of the RealWorld specification. Developed for PECathon, this Medium-inspired application demonstrates advanced React+Redux patterns, authentication workflows, and complex state management. The platform enables users to create, publish, and discover articles while fostering community engagement through comments, follows, and interactions.

The frontend leverages React with Redux for predictable state management, implementing sophisticated features like a bookmarking system for saving articles to a reading list, user mentions with @username syntax triggering real-time notifications, smart article recommendations based on tags and reading history, and a complete comment voting system with upvotes and ranking. Additional enhancements include search functionality, offline reading capabilities, user avatars with fallback initials, adjustable font sizes for accessibility, and skeleton loading states for improved UX.

The backend is built with Node.js and Express, providing a robust REST API with JWT authentication, MongoDB for data persistence, and real-time notification delivery. The architecture follows best practices with proper separation of concerns, middleware for authentication and validation, and optimized database queries. The application handles complex relationships between users, articles, comments, and tags while maintaining performance and scalability.

title: Saksham AI
shortDesc: EdTech platform with AI-powered internship finder using NLP for matching students with relevant opportunities.
longDesc:
Developed for the prestigious Smart India Hackathon 2025, Saksham AI is an innovative EdTech platform that transforms how students discover and secure internship opportunities. The AI-powered matching engine uses advanced NLP algorithms to analyze student profiles, skills, projects, and preferences, then recommends highly relevant internships from a curated database of opportunities across various industries and domains.

The platform features a comprehensive skill assessment system with interactive quizzes that evaluate both theoretical knowledge and practical problem-solving abilities. Students can build their professional portfolio directly on the platform, generate ATS-friendly resumes with smart suggestions, and access curated interview preparation resources. Beautiful data visualizations using Chart.js help students track their progress, identify skill gaps, and set achievement goals.

Framer Motion powers smooth animations throughout the interface, creating an engaging and modern user experience that keeps students motivated in their career journey. The platform includes mentorship matching, peer learning communities, and success story showcases from students who secured internships through the platform. Firebase handles authentication, real-time features, and scalable data storage, ensuring a seamless experience for the growing user base.

title: Project J
shortDesc: JEE preparation platform with college predictor algorithm and educational resources for engineering aspirants.
longDesc:
Project J is a comprehensive JEE preparation platform born from personal experience as a JEE aspirant. The platform features an intelligent college predictor that analyzes previous year cutoffs, seat matrices, preference patterns, and historical trends to suggest the best possible college and branch combinations based on the student's expected rank, category, and home state. The predictions are updated annually with latest counseling data.

Beyond prediction, the platform offers extensive study resources including chapter-wise notes organized by exam weightage, previous year questions with detailed solutions and video explanations, topic-wise test series with performance analytics, and a formula sheet generator that creates personalized revision sheets. Students can track their preparation progress, identify weak areas, and receive personalized improvement suggestions.

The responsive design built with Bootstrap ensures accessibility across all devices, from desktop computers in coaching centers to mobile phones during commute. LocalStorage integration saves student preferences, mock test history, and prediction history for quick future reference without requiring login, respecting privacy while providing convenience. The platform has helped thousands of students make informed decisions about their engineering career.

title: Radioo
shortDesc: Online radio streaming platform with music discovery and entertainment features built with vanilla JavaScript.
longDesc:
Radioo brings the nostalgic charm of radio to the digital age through a beautifully designed online streaming platform. The application connects to various radio stations worldwide using public radio APIs, offering users an endless stream of music, news, talk shows, and entertainment. The clean, intuitive interface makes discovering new stations effortless, with categories ranging from jazz and classical to pop, electronic, and regional music.

Built entirely with vanilla JavaScript, the platform demonstrates the power of native web technologies without framework dependencies. The Web Audio API integration provides real-time audio visualization effects that dance and pulse with the music, creating an immersive listening experience. Users can see frequency bars, waveforms, and color-reactive visuals that respond to the audio being played.

Favorite stations can be bookmarked for quick access, and the platform remembers your listening history to provide personalized recommendations. The responsive design ensures perfect playback whether you're on desktop, tablet, or mobile. Features include sleep timer, station search, genre filtering, and the ability to share stations with friends via social media integration.

title: Calculator
shortDesc: Multi-purpose calculator web app with BMI calculator, graphing, and various mathematical operations.
longDesc:
This isn't your ordinary calculator – it's a comprehensive mathematical toolkit that handles everything from basic arithmetic to complex scientific calculations and interactive graph plotting. The multi-mode interface switches seamlessly between standard, scientific, graphing, and specialty calculators including BMI, age, percentage, unit converters, and programmers' calculators with hex/binary/octal conversions.

The graphing calculator powered by Math.js renders mathematical functions in real-time with smooth animations as you type. It supports multiple simultaneous equations with customizable colors, adjustable axis ranges, zoom and pan controls, and the ability to find intersection points. Users can plot standard functions, parametric equations, and even implicit curves with high precision.

The clean, modern interface features theme switching between light, dark, and colorful modes, along with comprehensive keyboard shortcuts for power users. Built as a Progressive Web App (PWA), it works completely offline once installed and can be added to your device's home screen for instant access. Calculation history is preserved across sessions, and results can be copied or shared easily.

title: Lyncc
shortDesc: Real-time video calling application with WebRTC integration and Firebase backend for seamless communication.
longDesc:
Lyncc is a peer-to-peer video calling solution that proves you don't need complicated backend infrastructure for real-time communication. Using WebRTC technology with Firebase for signaling, the application establishes direct connections between users, ensuring low-latency, high-quality video calls without routing through central servers. This architecture provides better privacy and reduces operational costs.

The application features room-based calling with shareable invite links, full-featured screen sharing capabilities for presentations and collaboration, text chat during calls for sharing links and notes, and intuitive camera/microphone controls with device selection. Users can switch cameras mid-call, blur their background, and adjust audio settings in real-time. The clean UI provides visual feedback for connection status and call quality indicators.

Developed in collaboration with Arunjay, the project demonstrates advanced real-time web technologies while maintaining simplicity. Whether for casual catch-ups with friends and family or professional meetings and interviews, Lyncc delivers a reliable video calling experience entirely within the browser. No downloads, no plugins, no account required – just create a room and share the link.

title: DynWave
shortDesc: Dynamic chat application with real-time messaging capabilities and modern UI for seamless communication.
longDesc:
DynWave delivers a dynamic real-time chat experience powered by Socket.io and Express.js. The platform supports both private one-on-one messaging and group conversations with unlimited participants. Features include typing indicators that show when someone is composing a message, read receipts for message delivery confirmation, and emoji reactions that make conversations feel natural and engaging.

The modern UI, developed in collaboration with Divyanshi, features smooth CSS animations, comprehensive emoji picker, file sharing capabilities, and a beautiful color scheme that adapts to user preferences with light and dark modes. Messages support rich formatting, link previews, and image embedding. Users can search through conversation history, star important messages, and create message threads.

Built with Node.js on the backend, the application demonstrates full-stack JavaScript capabilities with efficient WebSocket connections handling hundreds of concurrent users without breaking a sweat. The architecture uses event-driven programming for real-time synchronization, ensuring messages appear instantly across all connected devices. Redis integration provides message persistence and enables horizontal scaling for production deployments.

title: MySQL Project
shortDesc: Database management system project with Python integration for Class 12 computer science practicals.
longDesc:
This project showcases the integration of Python with MySQL database, developed as part of the Class 12 Computer Science CBSE curriculum. The application implements a complete inventory management system with full CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) through an intuitive command-line interface. The system manages product information, tracks stock levels, records transactions, and generates reports.

The system features secure user authentication with role-based access control, comprehensive data validation to prevent incorrect entries, advanced search functionality with multiple filter options, and detailed reporting capabilities including sales summaries and inventory status. The menu-driven interface makes navigation intuitive even for users unfamiliar with databases. Error handling ensures graceful recovery from invalid inputs or connection issues.

Detailed documentation explains database normalization principles, SQL query optimization techniques, and Python's mysql.connector library usage with best practices. Each function is commented explaining the logic and algorithm used. This project serves as both a practical learning resource for students preparing for board exams and a functional application that demonstrates proper software development practices including separation of concerns and modular design.

title: VSEC
shortDesc: School website with educational resources and information management system built with modern web technologies.
longDesc:
VSEC (Virendra Swaroop Education Centre) is a modern school website designed to streamline communication between the institution, students, parents, and prospective families. The platform features comprehensive sections for academics including curriculum details and academic calendar, admissions with downloadable forms and fee structure, upcoming events with registration, detailed faculty profiles, and a dynamic gallery showcasing school activities and achievements.

Built with attention to accessibility and performance, the website loads quickly even on slower connections common in many parts of India. The design follows WCAG guidelines ensuring the content is accessible to users with disabilities. jQuery powers interactive elements like image sliders, dropdown menus, form validations, and smooth scrolling navigation. The contact forms integrate with email services for direct communication.

SEO optimization ensures the school ranks well in local searches, helping parents find the institution when searching for schools in the area. The responsive design works flawlessly across devices, from feature phones used by many parents to desktop computers in offices. The CMS-like admin panel allows school staff to update content, post announcements, and manage the gallery without technical knowledge.

title: ByteKart
shortDesc: Full-featured e-commerce platform with shopping cart, product catalog, and checkout functionality.
longDesc:
ByteKart is a feature-rich e-commerce platform that simulates a complete online shopping experience from browsing to checkout. The application includes an extensive product catalog organized by categories, advanced search with autocomplete suggestions, filtering options by price range and attributes, sorting by various criteria, a persistent shopping cart with quantity management, wishlist functionality, and a multi-step checkout process with order summary.

The project taught valuable lessons about state management complexity, data persistence strategies, and user experience design for commercial applications. Products feature detailed views with zoomable images, comprehensive specifications, customer reviews section, Q&A functionality, and intelligently curated related product suggestions. The checkout flow includes address management, payment method selection (simulated), order review, and confirmation with order tracking.

The admin-like interface allows for product management, demonstrating full CRUD operations without a backend through clever use of LocalStorage and JavaScript object manipulation. Users can add products, update inventory, modify prices, and manage categories. This project serves as a practical demonstration of how complex e-commerce functionality can be prototyped on the frontend before backend integration.

title: Finixx
shortDesc: Online gaming platform with multiplayer functionality and entertainment features for collaborative gaming.
longDesc:
Finixx is an exciting space-themed arcade game built with HTML5 Canvas and vanilla JavaScript. Players navigate their spacecraft through an asteroid field while collecting power-ups, avoiding obstacles, and battling enemy ships. The game features multiple levels with progressively increasing difficulty, high score tracking with local leaderboards, smooth 60fps animations, and satisfying visual feedback for every action.

Developed in collaboration with Arunjay, the project demonstrates game development fundamentals including sprite-based animation with sprite sheets, precise collision detection using bounding boxes and pixel-perfect techniques, particle effects for explosions and thrust, game state management with pause and resume, and progressive difficulty scaling that keeps players engaged without frustrating them.

Sound effects and a retro-inspired synthesized soundtrack enhance the gaming experience, with volume controls and mute options. The responsive controls work seamlessly with both keyboard arrows/WASD and touch inputs with virtual joystick, making it playable on desktop and mobile devices alike. The game includes multiple ship skins, weapon upgrades, and achievement badges that add replay value and encourage players to improve their skills.

title: YT Video Downloader
shortDesc: YouTube video downloader utility with clean interface and multiple format support for content creators.
longDesc:
This utility provides a clean, ad-free interface for downloading YouTube videos in various formats and qualities. Built with React and serverless Netlify Functions, users simply paste a video URL and the tool fetches video metadata including thumbnail, title, author, and duration. Select your preferred quality from Best Quality (highest available resolution), Lowest Quality (for saving bandwidth), or Audio Only (for music downloads).

The interface features a modern brutalist design with glassmorphism effects, a convenient clipboard paste button for quick URL input, real-time video preview before downloading, and quality selection with clear descriptions. The tool handles all processing through secure serverless functions, ensuring privacy and avoiding the bloat and intrusive ads found on most download websites.

Built with modern technologies including React for the frontend, Netlify Functions for serverless backend processing, ytdl-core for YouTube video extraction, and a responsive design that works beautifully on all devices. Features include error handling with helpful feedback, loading states for better UX, and support for various video formats. Note: Users are encouraged to respect copyright and only download content they have rights to use.

title: Practicals Class 12
shortDesc: Comprehensive collection of Python programming practicals and projects for Class 12 computer science.
longDesc:
A comprehensive repository of Python programming practicals covering the entire Class 12 Computer Science (CBSE) curriculum. Each practical includes a clear problem statement, well-commented solution code following PEP-8 guidelines, sample inputs/outputs demonstrating various edge cases, and detailed explanations of the logic, algorithms, and time complexity considerations used in the solution.

Topics covered include Python fundamentals with advanced concepts like decorators and generators, file handling for both text and CSV with real-world examples, data structures implementation including stacks and queues with practical applications, MySQL database connectivity with transaction management, data visualization using Matplotlib and Pandas for analysis projects, and NumPy array operations for numerical computing tasks.

The repository is organized chapter-wise with a clear folder structure matching the textbook. It serves as a valuable resource for students preparing for practical exams and viva voce, with additional practice problems beyond the syllabus, common interview questions for each topic, and tips for explaining code to examiners. Many students have used this repository to score full marks in their practical examinations.

title: Practicals Class 10
shortDesc: Web-based computer practicals collection for Class 10 with interactive examples and educational content.
longDesc:
An interactive web-based collection of computer practicals designed for Class 10 students following the CBSE curriculum. The website transforms dry textbook exercises into engaging, hands-on experiences with live code editors where students can modify and run code, step-by-step guides with explanations at every stage, and instant visual feedback showing results of code execution.

Covering both HTML/CSS web development fundamentals and Python programming basics, the platform makes learning accessible and enjoyable. Each practical includes theory explanations with relatable analogies, worked examples with detailed walkthroughs, practice exercises of varying difficulty levels, and interactive quizzes to test understanding. Progress is tracked so students can identify areas needing more practice.

Hosted on GitHub Pages, the project also served as a practical learning experience in web development, version control with Git, and deployment workflows. The website helped many classmates understand concepts they struggled with in traditional classroom settings. The responsive design ensures it works well on school computer labs, home PCs, and mobile devices. This project sparked my passion for creating educational technology that makes learning more effective and enjoyable.
